info.author: George King
classifiers: License :: CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) Public Domain Dedication
info.description: Pat is a tool for patching text files, similar to the traditional unix `diff` and `patch`. It is designed to make patching text data (not just source code) more convenient than the older tools, in particular within the Muck build system envirnoment (see http://github.com/gwk/muck).
info.name: pat-tool
info.summary: Pat is a tool for patching text files.
info.html_description: Pat is a tool for patching text files, similar to the traditional unix diff and patch. It is designed to make patching text data (not just source code) more convenient than the older tools, in particular within the Muck build system envirnoment (see http://github.com/gwk/muck).
